item.title: Help please! 317
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

[quote=“TempahScape, post:9, topic:390319”]I am using ButterScape 317,

Here’s a link to it if you need

RaGEZONE - MMO development community

[Release]ButterScape[Release] - RaGEZONE - MMO development community

~Butter's Dream Client+Server~ Cilent is open source Please post if you have looked at this post and downloaded :P Credits: I loot I,Galkon, Iceman, Knight20202, Jukk, Dragmagi

By the way, is it possible for you to give me your cache? Because I really don’t care what cache I have, but it has to work obviously :P[/quote]
doesent really work like that

if(s.startsWith("add model")) { try { int ModelIndex = Integer.parseInt(s.substring(10)); byte[] abyte0 = GetModel(ModelIndex); if(abyte0 != null && abyte0.length > 0){ aClass14Array970[1].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0, (byte)2, ModelIndex); method77("Model: ["+ModelIndex+"] added successfully!", 0, "", aBoolean991); }else{ method77("Unable to find the model. "+ModelIndex, 0, "", aBoolean991); } }
i found that in the client so there must be some way to add the model

just type addmodel without the ::
maybe that will work

EDIT:
yeah just type add model (modelid) without the ::
that works

item.title: Help please! 317
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

TempahScape:

I am adding the models to the models folder, adding ints to class8.java, then server-sided go to item.cfg, and put the item id in, right?

item.cfg doesent do anything beside put a name on the weapon when you wield and give it a price/stats you dont need to put it in there
if you add it to the models folder then you have to type a command look through all your commands for one thats similar to the one i said it should be ::addmodel but sometimes people change things

item.title: Help please! 317

item.description:

Wielded

Inventory model

My ints…

if(i == 13211){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 13412; class8.anInt181 = 810; class8.anInt190 = 28; class8.anInt198 = 208; class8.anInt169 = 5; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 13414; class8.anInt200 = 13413; class8.anInt175 = 6573; class8.anInt197 = 6573; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "slayer helmet"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A helmet of great craftmanship.".getBytes(); }
